definition: Western medicine/a doctor trained in Western medicine
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
Chinese and Western medicine/a doctor trained in Chinese and Western medicine
to combine traditional Chinese and Western medicine

sentences.english: Modern Western medicine has had little impact in staying the disease's deadly hand.
sentences.chinese: 现代西医技术对这种疾病的死亡之手基本束手无策。

sentences.english: To explore traditional chinese and western medicine treatment methods anorectal prolapse.
sentences.chinese: 探讨中西医治疗肛管直肠脱垂的方法。

sentences.english: However, it also encountered several problems on the way of development.
sentences.chinese: 但中西医结合在发展的道路上也遇到了若干问题。

sentences.english: Patients in the treatment group took Modified Li Zhong Tang on the basis of conventional western treatment.
sentences.chinese: 治疗组在西医常规治疗基础上服用加味理中汤。

sentences.english: Western medicine's "Seven Emotions" disease is well founded.
sentences.chinese: 西医的“七情”致病很有道理。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the treatment perscription with the method of integrated traditional and western medicine in type 2 diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨2型糖尿病中西医结合治疗方案。

sentences.english: Comparative study was done on mentality versus consciousness and mental confusion versus conscious disturbance in western medicine and traditional Chinese medicine.
sentences.chinese: 对中西医学神与意识，神昏与意识障碍进行比较研究。

sentences.english: Resultantly , the gastric cancer postoperative complications were successfully treated with the combination of Chinese and Western medicine.
sentences.chinese: 中西医结合治疗成功控制此胃癌术后并发症的案例。

sentences.english: Surgery of integrated Chinese and Western medicine is a clinical discipline that attaches great importance to practice.
sentences.chinese: 中西医结合外科学是一门实践性极强的临床学科。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical efficacy of treating tubal reghancy with combined therapy of Chinese and western medicine.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨中西医结合治疗输卵管妊娠的临床疗效。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To observe the effect of traditional Chinese medicine combined with western medicine on treatment muscular asthenopia.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察用中西医结合方法治疗肌性视疲劳的疗效。

sentences.english: Though she chose to become a doctor, she said there was ample room for both approaches.
sentences.chinese: 虽然她选择成为医生，但她表示西医和巫医并行不悖。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effect of Banxiaxiexin decoction combined with Mosapride tablets in treating functional dyspepsia.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察中西医结合治疗功能性消化不良的疗效。

sentences.english: We observed the effect of integrative medical treatment in therapy group and simply isosorbide dinitrate treatment in control group.
sentences.chinese: 对中西医结合方法和单纯服用消心痛的疗效进行观察。

sentences.english: To explore the clinical effect of Chinese medicine combined with western medicine in treating lymphoid tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨中西医治疗淋巴结核的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To explore how to increase cure rate of hemorrhagic necrotizing pancreatitis.
sentences.chinese: 中西医结合治疗急性坏死性筋膜炎能取得良好的疗效。

definition: traditional Chinese medical science/a doctor trained in Chinese medicine
Chinese and Western medicine/a doctor trained in Chinese and Western medicine
diagnosis and treatment based on an overall analysis of the illness and the patient's condition
to combine traditional Chinese and Western medicine
acupuncture and moxibustion/to give or have acupuncture and moxibustion
pattern-syndrome identification based on the eight principles (TCM)
